summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fifth Avenue West from Olympic Place to Kinnear Place; and Kinnear Place from Fifth Avenue West to Park Place, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein concrete sidewalks with wooden curbs, gutters and crosswalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 63 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by an act of the Legislature of the State of Washington, entitled "An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency," approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
